TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DragDrop extends System.Object
public ref class DragDrop abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用以啟始拖放作業的 Helper 方法與欄位，包括開始拖放作業的方法，以及用以加入及移除拖放相關事件處理常式的機能。

span.span: Provides helper methods and fields for initiating drag-and-drop operations, including a method to begin a drag-and-drop operation, and facilities for adding and removing drag-and-drop related event handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放功能一般是指資料傳送的方法，這種方法需要使用滑鼠 (或其他一些指標裝置) 選取一或多個物件，將這些物件拖曳到 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中一些想要的置放目標上，然後置放這些物件。Drag-and-drop commonly refers to a method of data transfer that involves using a mouse (or some other pointing device) to select one or more objects, dragging these objects over some desired drop target in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], and dropping them. 拖放作業相當於複製 （或剪下）-和-貼上用來將資料從一個物件或應用程式之間傳輸的作業。A drag-and-drop operation is analogous to a copy (or cut)-and-paste operation that is used to transfer data from one object or application to another. 拖放作業通常牽涉到兩個合作對象： 從拖曳來源的拖曳的資料來源和置放目標會接收置放的資料。Drag-and-drop operations typically involve two parties: a drag source from which the dragged data originates and a drop target which receives the dropped data. 拖放作業所需的事件和方法會在 類別中定義。The events and methods required for drag-and-drop operations are defined in the class. 拖放事件都可以附加至任何的附加的事件或。The drag-and-drop events are attached events that can be attached to any or . 拖曳來源和置放目標可能是在相同的應用程式或不同的應用程式的 UI 項目。The drag source and drop target may be UI elements in the same application or in different applications. 不過，置放目標必須知道如何處理拖曳來源所傳遞的資料。However, the drop target must know how to process the data being passed by the drag source. > [!NOTE] > 和類別包含拖放事件的別名，如此會顯示事件類別的 [成員] 清單中，但這些類別會繼承基底類別。The and classes contain aliases for the drag-and-drop events so that the events appear in the class members list when these classes are inherited as a base class. 當您在其中一個類別上拖放事件附加事件處理常式時，處理常式會附加至基礎事件也會收到相同的執行個體的事件資料。When you attach an event handler to a drag-and-drop event on one of these classes, the handler is attached to the underlying event and they receive the same instance of event data. 如需範例，請參閱 。For example, see . 拖曳來源會呼叫靜態 方法，並將所傳送的資料傳遞給該方法，來啟始拖放作業。The drag source initiates a drag-and-drop operation by calling the static method and passing the transferred data to it. 項目通常會處理下列事件時為拖曳來源：An element typically handles the following events when it is a drag source: - - 項目通常會處理下列事件時置放目標：An element typically handles the following events when it is a drop target: - - - - 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱 < [ 拖放概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。For more information and examples, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 負責判斷何時發生拖曳，然後再起始拖放作業的應用程式。It is the responsibility of your application to determine when a drag occurs, and then initiate the drag-and-drop operation. 一般而言，這是何時和一連串事件，就會發生拖曳的項目上方。Typically, this is when a and sequence of events occurs over the element to be dragged. 藉由呼叫靜態起始拖放作業方法並傳遞給它的傳送的資料。You initiate the drag-and-drop operation by calling the static method and passing the transferred data to it. 方法會視需要自動將資料包裝在 中。The method will automatically wrap the data in a if necessary. 為了進一步控制資料格式，您可以將資料包裝在 中，再傳遞給 方法。For greater control over the data format, you can wrap the data in a before passing it to the method. 從傳回的值方法就是值屬性設在置放目標的事件處理常式。The value returned from the method is the value of the property set in the drop target's event handler. 如果傳回的值不符合其中一個`allowedEffects`呼叫中指定，不會執行拖放作業。If the return value does not match one of the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to , the drag-and-drop operation is not performed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從 項目的 事件處理常式啟始拖放作業，使該項目成為拖曳來源。The following example shows how to initiate a drag-and-drop operation from the event handler of an element to make it a drag source. 傳送的資料是橢圓形之字串表示法屬性。The transferred data is the string representation of the ellipse's property. 將資料傳遞給做為字串的方法和自動包裝在。The data is passed to the method as a string and is automatically wrapped in a . [!code-csharp[DragDropSnippets#DoDragDrop](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#dodragdrop)] [!code-vb[DragDropSnippets#DoDragDrop](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#dodragdrop)]

summary.span: 在置放目標項目的界限內拖曳物件時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an object is dragged into the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次將物件拖曳到範圍內的項目做為置放目標，每次時，會引發此事件。This event is raised once each time an object is dragged into the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target. 如果不會引發這個事件的項目屬性是`false`。This event is not raised if the element's property is `false`. 處理這個事件是選擇性的置放目標上，並不需要所有的拖放案例。Handling this event is optional for the drop target, and is not necessary for all drag-and-drop scenarios. 您通常會處理這個事件來預覽拖放作業的效果 (如果適用於應用程式的話)。You typically handle this event to provide a preview of the effects of the drag-and-drop operation, if appropriate for your application. 請勿在 事件中設定 屬性，因為它會在 事件中遭到覆寫。Do not set the property in the event, as it will be overwritten in the event. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . ## Examples 下列範例示範 項目的 事件處理常式。The following example shows the event handler for an element. 這個程式碼會儲存目前的 筆刷，來預覽拖放作業的效果。This code previews the effects of the drag-and-drop operation by saving the current brush. 然後它會檢查是否拖曳到橢圓形上的橢圓形包含可轉換成字串資料。It then checks to see if the being dragged over the ellipse contains string data that can be converted to a . 如果是，則會將 套用至橢圓形。If so, the is applied to the ellipse. 這項變更會在 事件處理常式中還原。The change is reverted in the event handler. 如果無法將資料轉換成 ，則不會執行任何動作。If the data cannot be converted to a , no action is performed. span.span: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target without being dropped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後每次將物件拖曳出的項目，但未置放做為置放目標的界限，則會引發這個事件。This event is raised once each time an object is dragged out of the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target without being dropped. 如果不會引發這個事件的項目屬性是`false`。This event is not raised if the element's property is `false`. 您通常會處理這個事件，以復原對所做的任何變更事件處理常式。You typically handle this event to undo any changes that you made in the event handler. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . ## Examples 下列範例示範 項目的 事件處理常式。The following example shows the event handler for an element. 這個程式碼透過將儲存的 套用至橢圓形，來復原在 事件處理常式中執行的預覽。This code undoes the preview performed in the event handler by applying the saved to the ellipse. summary.span: 在置放目標項目的界限內拖曳物件時持續發生。

span.span: Occurs continuously while an object is dragged within the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在一個被拖曳的物件是做為置放目標項目的界限內時，持續，則會引發這個事件。This event is raised continuously while a dragged object is within the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target. 如果不會引發這個事件的項目屬性是`false`。This event is not raised if the element's property is `false`. 事件會搭配拖曳來源上的事件。The event is paired with the event on the drag source. 在 事件處理常式，您通常檢查傳送的資料是否在置放目標可以處理的格式。In the event handler, you typically check that the transferred data is in a format that the drop target can process. 您也可以檢查是否任何輔助按鍵按下，這通常表示使用者想在移動或複製動作。You can also check whether any modifier keys are pressed, which typically indicates whether the user intends a move or a copy action. 執行這些檢查之後，您可以設定 屬性，以通知拖曳來源有關置放資料的效果。After these checks are performed, you set the property to notify the drag source what effect dropping the data will have. 拖曳來源接收資訊儲存在這個屬性事件引數，而且也可以設定適當的資料指標來提供回饋給使用者。The drag source receives this information in the property of the event arguments, and can set an appropriate cursor to give feedback to the user. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . ## Examples 下列範例示範 項目的 事件處理常式。The following example shows the event handler for an element. 這個程式碼會檢查是否要將 拖曳到橢圓形上，該橢圓形包含可轉換成 的字串資料。This code checks to see if the being dragged over the ellipse contains string data that can be converted to a . 如果是，則會將 屬性設定為 。If so, it sets the property to . 這會向拖曳來源表示資料可以複製到橢圓形。This indicates to the drag source that the data can be copied to the ellipse. 如果無法將資料轉換成 ，則會將 屬性設定為 。If the data cannot be converted to a , the property is set to . 這會向拖曳來源表示橢圓形不是資料的有效置放目標。This indicates to the drag source that the ellipse is not a valid drop target for the data. summary.span: 在置放目標項目的界限內置放物件時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an object is dropped within the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件做為置放目標項目的界限內時卸除後，就會引發事件。The event is raised once when an object is dropped within the bounds of an element that is acting as a drop target. 如果不會引發這個事件的項目屬性是`false`。This event is not raised if the element's property is `false`. 此事件會結束拖放作業。This event ends the drag-and-drop operation. 在 事件處理常式，您會擷取傳送的資料，從並執行應用程式所需資料的任何處理。In the event handler, you extract the transferred data from the and perform any processing of the data that your application requires. 以設定通知拖曳來源的下拉式清單，例如複製或移動效果屬性中的事件處理常式。To notify the drag source of the effect of the drop, such as a copy or move, set the property in the event handler. 這個屬性的值是傳回值的起始拖放作業的方法。The value of this property is the return value of the method that initiated the drag-and-drop operation. 如果傳回的值不符合其中一個`allowedEffects`呼叫中指定，不會執行拖放作業。If the value that is returned does not match one of the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to , the drag-and-drop operation is not performed. 初始值屬性是相同`allowedEffects`呼叫中指定方法。The initial value of the property is the same as the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to the method. 如果您未設定屬性，會傳回這個初始的值，且假設一`allowedEffects`發生。If you do not set the property, this initial value is returned and it is assumed that one the `allowedEffects` occurred. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . ## Examples 下列範例示範 項目的 事件處理常式。The following example shows the event handler for an element. 此程式碼會套用拖放作業的效果。This code applies the effects of the drag-and-drop operation. 它會檢查是否要將 拖曳到橢圓形上，該橢圓形包含可轉換成 的字串資料。It checks to see if the being dragged over the ellipse contains string data that can be converted to a . 如果是，則會將 套用至橢圓形。If so, the is applied to the ellipse. 如果無法將資料轉換成 ，則不會執行任何動作。If the data cannot be converted to a , no action is performed. [!code-csharp[DragDropSnippets#Drop](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#drop)] [!code-vb[DragDropSnippets#Drop](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#drop)]

summary.span: 拖放作業正在進行時持續發生，並可讓拖曳來源提供意見反應給使用者。

span.span: Occurs continuously while a drag-and-drop operation is in progress, and enables the drag source to give feedback to the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖曳來源被拖曳的期間，會持續引發 事件。The event is raised continuously while the drag source is being dragged. 此事件會搭配置放目標上的事件。This event is paired with the event on the drop target. 這個事件的預設處理常式會檢查拖曳來源是否在有效的置放目標上。The default handler for this event checks whether the drag source is over a valid drop target. 如果是，則會檢查允許的置放目標效果。If it is, it checks the allowed effects of the drop target. 然後將允許的置放效果回饋給使用者。It then gives feedback to the end user regarding the allowed drop effects. 透過將滑鼠游標變更為不置放、複製或移動游標，通常可以完成這項作業。This is typically done by changing the mouse cursor to a no-drop, copy, or move cursor. 只有在需要使用自訂游標提供回饋給使用者時，才應該處理這個事件。You should only handle this event if you need to use custom cursors to provide feedback to the user. 如果您處理這個事件時，您必須標示為已處理，以防止覆寫您的處理常式的預設行為。If you handle this event, you must mark it as handled to prevent the default behavior from overriding your handler. > [!CAUTION] > 拖放作業的持續期間，會引發這個事件。This event is raised continuously during the drag-and-drop operation. 因此，您應該避免在事件處理常式需要大量資源的工作。Therefore, you should avoid resource-intensive tasks in the event handler. 例如，使用快取資料指標，而不是每次引發 事件都建立新的資料指標。For example, use a cached cursor instead of creating a new cursor each time the event is raised. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is .

summary.span: 持續發生於拖放作業正在進行時，並可讓拖曳來源根據按鍵/按鈕狀態結束拖放作業。

span.span: Occurs continuously while a drag-and-drop operation is in progress, and enables the drop source to end the drag-and-drop operation depending on the key/button states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖曳來源被拖曳的期間，會持續引發 事件。The event is raised continuously while the drag source is being dragged. 您可以處理這個事件，根據 ESC、SHIFT、CTRL 鍵和 ALT 鍵的狀態，以及滑鼠按鈕的狀態，來決定拖放作業的結束動作。You can handle this event to determine what action ends the drag-and-drop operation based on the state of the ESC, SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, as well as the state of the mouse buttons. 這個事件的預設處理常式會在按下 ESC 鍵時取消拖放作業，並在放開滑鼠按鈕時置放資料。The default handler for this event cancels the drag-and-drop operation if the ESC key is pressed, and drops the data if the mouse button is released. 如果您處理這個事件來變更預設行為，請務必提供同等的機制，在處理常式中結束拖放作業。If you handle this event to change the default behavior, be sure to provide an equivalent mechanism in your handler to end the drag-and-drop operation. 否則，方法將不會傳回與您的應用程式將會停止回應。Otherwise, the method will not return and your application will stop responding. 如果您處理這個事件時，您必須標示為已處理，以防止覆寫您的處理常式的預設行為。If you handle this event, you must mark it as handled to prevent the default behavior from overriding your handler. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier Field|| |路由策略Routing Strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is .
